description: amFilm (TM) Premium Screen Protector for the new iPad is made from superior quality 3-layer PET film, and specifically designed to fit the new iPad and iPad with Retina display (iPad 3 and iPad 4, 3rd and 4th generation). It effectively protects the screen from daily scratches, dust and scrapes. With self-adhering surface, the film is designed for easy application and zero-to-minimal bubbles during application. A bubble removal card is also included to remove the occasional bubble easily.Two screen protector films, micro-fiber cleaning cloth and bubble removal card are included.amFilm(TM) is a trademark and protected by US Trademark Law.
title: AM amFilm (TM) Premium Screen Protector Film Clear (Invisible) for iPad 2 and the New iPad (iPad 3 and iPad 4, the 3rd and 4th generation) (2-Pack) [in AM retail package]
